<center>

### Only Open Data

<br>
<br>

Currently the app is using the following sources of data:

<br>

DMSP data collected by US Air Force Weather Agency Image and data processing by NOAA's National Geophysical Data Center ([link](https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/eog/download.html)).
<hr style='margin-top:-1em'>
VIIRS data produced by Earth Observation Group, Payne Institute for Public Policy ([link](https://eogdata.mines.edu/download_dnb_composites.html)).

UCDP Georeferenced Event dataset, collected by the Department of Peace and Conflict Research, Uppsala University ([link](https://ucdp.uu.se/)).

Geographical Administrative Divisions v3.6, produced and distributed by GADM ([link](https://gadm.org/)).

Myanmar Census data, produced and distributed by Myanmar Information Managament Unit ([link](http://themimu.info/)).

 </center>
